name: tachyons-border-widths
description: Border width CSS module for Tachyons

scripts.start: tachyons src/tachyons-border-widths.css > css/tachyons-border-widths.css && tachyons src/tachyons-border-widths.css --minify > css/tachyons-border-widths.min.css && tachyons src/tachyons-border-widths.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
